EmailTemplate.description: Response for April 2012 webinar with Bridgeway and Caterpillar
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Apr12 Bridgeway Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Integration Builder Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Integrating for Power and Performance Date: Thursday, April 12 Time: 12pm Central Duration: 1 hour
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 97447854 The webinar will open in a new window.
Audio:
US/Canada: (888) 567-1603 UK: 00 800 4747 4646 International Toll: (201) 604-5052 You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar.
http://www.intapp.com All information Copyright 2012 IntApp, Inc. All rights reserved.
